mapper.select: SELECT auth_menu.id, auth_menu.pid, auth_menu.name, auth_menu.label, auth_menu.href, auth_group_menus.sort FROM auth_menu INNER JOIN auth_group_menus ON auth_menu.id = auth_group_menus.menu_id INNER JOIN auth_user_groups ON auth_group_menus.group_id = auth_user_groups.group_id WHERE auth_user_groups.user_id = 1
